text: waqal rajul muwmin biallah min al frewn, yaktum 'iimanah mnkrana ealaa qwmh: kayf tsthlwn qatl rajul la jaram lah eindakum 'iilaa 'an yaqul rabiy allh, waqad ja'akum balbrahyn alqatet min rabikum ealaa sidq ma yqwl? fa'iina yak musaa kadhbana f'inn wbal kadhibuh eayid ealayh whdh, wa'iin yak sadqana lhqkm baed aladhi ytweeadkm bh, 'iina allah la yuafiq lalhaqu man hu mtjawz llhd, bitark alhaqu wal'iqbal ealaa albatl, kdhdhab bnsbth ma 'asraf fih 'iilaa allh
